column2: The §GCourt Faction§! strives for influence and vassal autonomy.
The §RGlory Faction§! strives for prestige and the spoils of war.
The §BOrder Faction§! strives for justice and a stable society.
The §YProsperity Faction§! strives for wealth and a healthy economy.
The §PTradition Faction§! strives for piety and the supremacy of religion.
It has been some time since the [Root.GetFactionName] faction got together to discuss the current state of the realm.  I wonder if I should schedule a meeting.
I cannot be bothered with this right now.

My [Root.GetLordLady],

It has been quite some time since we met up to discuss the realm affairs.  A meeting is to be taken place at [From.Capital.GetName] in seven days.

Looking forward to seeing you there,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
I have more important things to do.

My [Root.GetLordLady],

Unfortunately I will not be able to attend this week's [Root.GetFactionName] meeting due to unforseen circumstances.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
The members have arrived and it is time for me to propose my agenda.
I will focus on the faction...
I will focus on my liege...
I will focus on the realm...
There is only one logical reason to conduct these meetings...to benefit myself.
I will ask for membership dues.
I will ask for an artifact.
...maybe I should reflect on other options.
The court faction must prevail against the other four.
I will have them come up with new inventions.
I will organize a raid on a faction.
...maybe I should reflect on other options.
Our liege has been quite the topic lately.
I will have the faction keep a watchful eye for any enemies of the state.
I will try to make [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] disappear.
...maybe I should reflect on other options.
It is up to us to see [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] prosper...or fail.
...maybe I should reflect on other options.
No one from the [Root.GetFactionName] faction has showed up.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has informed the faction that the time to pay for membership priviliges is now due.
For the good of the faction I supposed.
...I lost the vote and I will now stand trial.
The [Root.GetFactionName] members believe that I am not fit to lead the faction and are now voting on whether I should retain my position or not.
For some time the [Root.GetFactionName] members have wondered if [From.GetTitledFirstName] is really fit to lead this faction.  A vote of no confidence is now being called in order to sort this out.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] lost the vote and will now stand trial.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has asked me for some advice.
I could teach [From.GetHerHim] how to be a better speaker.
I could teach [From.GetHerHim] how to seduce [From.GetBoyGirlOpp]s.
I could teach [From.GetHerHim] how to save money.
I could teach [From.GetHerHim] how to be a better fighter.
There is nothing for me to teach [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] told me how to be a better speaker.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] told me how to save money.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] told me how to be a better fighter.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] wasn't able to teach me anything.
Ahah I am better than [From.GetHerHim] I guess.
The [Root.GetFactionName] faction meeting was a success and everyone is already looking forward to the next one.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] wonders if I could spare [From.GetHerHim] an artifact.
As long as [From.GetHerHim] is humble about it.
Sure, as long as [From.GetHerHim] praises me to the rest of the faction.
Sorry, but I don't have any to spare.
...wants me to praise [From.GetHerHim] in front of the [Root.GetFactionName] faction.
I told the rest of the faction that if there is no enemy within, the enemy outside can do us no harm.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] suggested that we should all set our differences aside and work towards a common goal.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] approached me asking to set our differences aside.
I hope the others will also get along.
I told the [Root.GetFactionName] members to come up with new ideas on how to get an upperhand against the other factions.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is asking us to reflect on new ideas which will help us get an upperhand against the other factions.
Well atleast we get to relax.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] would like to raid the [event_target.raid_target.GetFactionName] faction.
This is not what the [Root.GetFactionName] stands for.
...I lost the vote and I will now stand trial.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] won the vote and we will now raid the [event_target.raid_target.GetFactionName] faction.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] lost the vote and will now stand trial.
[event_target.raid_target.GetTitledFirstName] and [event_target.raid_target.GetHerHis] fools stood no chance against the combined forces of the [Root.GetFactionName] faction.
The [From.GetFactionName] conducted a raid against the [Root.GetFactionName] faction and [From.GetTitledFirstName] helped [From.GetHerHim]self to some of my gold.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] gave a speech regarding [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].  I wonder if I should show my support for [From.Liege.GetHerHim].
Not my direct liege?  Not my problem.

My [Root.GetLordLady],

As you know the [From.GetFactionName] faction are your loyal servants and we each decided to donate something to you.  I hope that the gifts sent from us will only help to strenghten your just rule.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is asking us to keep a watchful eye for any threats directed towards [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
I suppose I could spare a few birds.

My [Root.GetLordLady],

We know that ruling such a great realm must be tough, so you can count on the [From.GetFactionName] faction to keep en eye out for any possible threats.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
[From.GetTitledFirstName] said that it is time for [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] to part this world.
Rulers come and go I suppose.
...it is time to plan the assassination.
...I lost the vote and I will now stand trial.
We will attempt to get rid of [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] lost the vote and will now stand trial.
